Welcome to **Genetic Data Analysis (CSES 7160)** at Auburn University.

This course covers statistical and computational foundations for analyzing genetic, genomic, and phenotypic data in crop science, with an emphasis on reproducible workflows using **R, Quarto, GitHub**, and modern mixed-model approaches.
